page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: SPECTATOR SPORTS We were very suprised to see that over half of the people questioned in our survey said they went to watch a sport. By far the greatest number went to watch football(soccer)the main foot ball teams(Walsall,Aston Villa,West. B rom.Birmingham,City and Wolves)play wi thin a radius of twenty miles from Pelsall snooker was the second most po pular.This shows how much more popular snooker has become in 1985. The rest of th e sports mertioned by people were watc hed by only a few,This we felt,was because there were not many cricket teams,tennis tournaments,(swimming com petitions etc.
